item.title: Spotify Engineering Culture - part 1 and 2
item.description: Spotify explique dans cette vidéo l’évolution de son fonctionnement interne pour atteindre la Culture Agile https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yvfz4HGtoPc https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vOt4BbWLWQw

item.title: Adopting Continuous Delivery
item.description: How to reduce the risk of releases through implementing continuous integration and test and deployment automation? How to implement these patterns even in complex, enterprise environments? Find out in Jez Humble’s talk at the Lean IT Summit 2017. Jez is the CTO of DevOps Research & Assessment LLC and co-author of "Continuous Delivery" and "The DevOps Handbook". https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6DeWOrmvhRM
